name: Larry Awesome!!!!!!!!
description:
You play as a young hobo named Larry who goes into a portal in search of money. But once he steps into the portal, he ends up in the wacky wonderland just trying to figure out what in the world is going on. Now he has to fight enemies and get through obstacles as he runs, jumps, and shoots into many portals to see if he could possibly just find his way out. Do you have what it takes to be totally Awesome!?!?!?

Update from 7/24/2015 : Enhanced ladder control, Less difficulty on the Final Boss (and way more fair to beat), Must re-download the game to have this update

Features:

  • Many Power-ups including a fully powered suit, and a toy spring
  • Fun and Silly Dialogue to much Larry's enthusiasm as he interacts with other people/creatures
  • Over 80 levels for you to run, jump, a shoot, and even swim (Go CRAZY!!!!)
  • Bosses
  • Mini-bosses
  • Cool Music and Sounds!!!!!
Questions??? Contact me at lj2517@ship.edu

Visit the facebook page at: https://www.facebook.com/LarryAwesome12345?ref=aym...
